Package com.palomamobile.android.sdk.message

At a high level the Message SDK supports the following functionality: User to single user or multiple users communication between users who have a mutual friend relationship Simple text messaging Link sharing (one or more HTTP accessible resources) Deleting messages

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IMessageManager
    Methods in this interface provide convenient job creation methods that provide easy access to the underlying IMessageService functionality.
    IMessageService
    This interface is consumed by the Retrofit library to provide access to the Paloma Mobile Platform Sharing and Messaging Service RESTful API.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseMessage
    Abstract class Message represents the information available about a message in the context of the Message SDK.
    EventMessageReceivedDeleted
    Event published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()) once the list of messages received changes as a result of message deletion.
    EventMessageSentPosted
    Event published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()) once a message is posted to a friend or friends.
    EventMessagesReceived
    Event published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()) once the list of messages received on the client is refreshed.
    EventMessagesSent
    Event published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()) when the list of messages sent is refreshed.
    JobDeleteMessageReceived
    Convenience wrapper around IMessageService.deleteMessageReceived(String, long, long, Map, String, String...) Once this job is completed (with success or failure) it posts EventMessageReceivedDeleted on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()).
    JobGetMessagesReceived
    Convenience wrapper around IMessageService.getMessagesReceived(String, long, Map, String, String...) Once this job is completed (with success or failure) it posts EventMessagesReceived on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()).
    JobGetMessagesSent
    Convenience wrapper around IMessageService.getMessagesSent(String, long, Map, String, String...) Once this job is completed (with success or failure) it posts EventMessagesSent on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()).
    JobPostMessage
    Convenience wrapper around IMessageService.postMessageSent(String, long, MessageSent) Once this job is completed (with success or failure) it posts EventMessageSentPosted on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()).
    MessageContentDetail
    Class MessageContentDetail represents the detailed content information available in a BaseMessage in the context of the Message SDK.
    MessageReceived
    Class MessageReceived represents the information available about a message received from another Sender in the context of the Message SDK.
    MessageSent
    Class MessageSent represents the information available about a message sent from current user to a list of recipient user ids.
    Sender
    Class Sender represents the information available about the sender of a MessageReceived.

Package com.palomamobile.android.sdk.message Description

At a high level the Message SDK supports the following functionality:
  • User to single user or multiple users communication between users who have a mutual friend relationship
  • Simple text messaging
  • Link sharing (one or more HTTP accessible resources)
  • Deleting messages
